CDO Toolkit

Data Standard

The Data Standard helps city teams make decisions with data and supports the creation of great public services.

  1. 1. Understand users and their needs

    Read more about point 1

  2. 2. Enable joined-up, real-time services

    Read more about point 2

  3. 3. Support data-driven decision making

    Read more about point 3

  4. 4. Collect the right data first time

    Read more about point 4

  5. 5. Make it simple to find the right data

    Read more about point 5

  6. 6. Data access, not data sharing

    Read more about point 6

  7. 7. Use common identifiers, data standards and design patterns

    Read more about point 7

  8. 8. Protect the safety, privacy and wellbeing of residents

    Read more about point 8

  9. 9. Be transparent about how data is used

    Read more about point 9

  10. 10. Custodianship and accountability are clear

    Read more about point 10

  11. 11. Make sure data works for everybody

    Read more about point 11

  12. 12. Work in multidisciplinary teams

    Read more about point 12

  13. 13. Use agile and open ways of working

    Read more about point 13

  14. 14. Define what success looks like and publish performance data

    Read more about point 14

  15. 15. Choose the right tools and technology

    Read more about point 15

  16. 16. Work in the open

    Read more about point 16
